export var authEndpoint='https://accounts.spotify.com/authorize/';var redirectUri='http://localhost:3000/';var clientId='377e5bf3054249ffb055e7a63ff091c8';// const clientSecret = 'e70ea7c0d2784a08a05a358fa12071c1';
var scopes=['user-read-currently-playing','user-read-recently-played','user-read-playback-state','user-top-read','user-modify-playback-state'];export var getTokenFromUrl=function getTokenFromUrl(){return window.location.hash.substring(1).split('&').reduce(function(initial,item){var parts=item.split('=');initial[parts[0]]=decodeURIComponent(parts[1]);return initial;},{});};export var loginUrl="".concat(authEndpoint,"?client_id=").concat(clientId,"&redirect_uri=").concat(redirectUri,"&scope=\n").concat(scopes.join('%20'),"&response_type=token&show_dialog=true");
